name: NCOVI Memory Game
description:
"Matching cards - Memory Game" is a puzzle game easy and simple to brain trainer your visual and auditory memory.
You have to find pairs of identical cards. The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. Tap to flip two cards. Match a pair and they disappear. Flip quickly. Exercices your Memory. Cards are laid out in a grid face down, and players take turns flipping pairs of cards over. When cards are turned over, it is important to remember the last position. Your kids will love. This game is very challenging.
Are you ready to challenge your memory daily with Memory Game ? Is the best game for memory trainer for all the family ! This is a big addictive puzzle game.
Exercise your memory, improve your concentration with Memory match! Test your memory ! Are you ready to challenge your memory daily? If you have a child train his memory with our puzzle. If you noticed that sometimes you forget things then this game is the best for challenging and training your memory.

Features
* Very cool graphics.

* Starts fast without any splash screens.
